name: Flappy Bird (itch) (rax00)
description:
This is a submission to the ASCII BASIC GAME 10Liner 2021.

Oric Atmos was my first computer, and so... :).

This game uses the alternate character set built into the ROM. (details here: https://osdk.org/index.php?page=articles&ref=ART9#title12 )

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

1. Download the zip file from here: http://www.petergordon.org.uk/oricutron/files/Oricutron_win32_v12.zip
2. Copy the file BIRD.TAP to the Oric\tapes folder
3. Start the emulator oricutron.exe
4. Type CLOAD"BIRD.TAP" and press enter
5. LIST to show the program
6. Type RUN to play the game

Keyboard controls: any key :)

The difficulty in the game gradually increases.
